committee_info.name: Finance
committee_info.description: Oversees the financial stability and responsible budgeting of Villa Capriani, ensuring transparent financial practices, effective budget management, and long-term financial health.
committee_info.charter: To ensure the financial health and transparency of Villa Capriani through responsible budgeting, financial planning, and oversight.

responsibilities: Create, oversee, and manage the annual community budget
Monitor financial health and provide transparent reporting to owners
Plan and manage reserve funds strategically
Evaluate expenditures and vendor agreements for cost efficiency and alignment with strategic goals
